  method: "POST",
  path: "/_inference/chat_completion/openai-completion/_stream",
  body: {
    messages: [
      {
        role: "user",
        content: [
          {
            type: "text",
            text: "What's the price of a scarf?",
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
    tools: [
      {
        type: "function",
        function: {
          name: "get_current_price",
          description: "Get the current price of a item",
          parameters: {
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              item: {
                id: "123",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    ],
    tool_choice: {
      type: "function",
      function: {
        name: "get_current_price",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
